text: @wizkidayo @naked_saint1 But have you heard abt miracles of recovery and that God's word can reach any soul anywhere and under any condition? Are you aware that these souls are being reached with or without physical contact? Are you aware of the impact if they flout COVID19 rules? #its4ourSake not theirs
